requirements.description: User will ensure that at all times you use the Services
you (including without limitation each Mobile Property) have a clearly labeled and easily accessible privacy policy
privacy policy complies with all applicable laws
provides end users with clear and comprehensive information about cookies
provides end users with clear and comprehensive information about device-specific information
provides end users with clear and comprehensive information about location information
provides end users with clear and comprehensive information about other information stored on, accessed on, or collected from end users' devices
includes, as applicable, information about end users' options for cookie management
